document_title: Ventricular tachycardia: Causes, symptoms, diagnosis, prevention
subsection_content:
There are many different factors that cause ventricular tachycardia. It is important to get an accurate diagnosis and appropriate treatment. Patients should see a doctor if they have any problems with their heart rhythm and have symptoms:
Chest pain;; Short of breath;; Lightheadedness;; Dizzy;; Faint;; Continuous rapid heart rate.
